property.name: loginSteps
property.description: The commands will be processed in the order they are entered into the map. Don't edit entries in place because that will change the order, re-enter all entries instead. The key is a character string that will uniquely indentify the tail of the telnet prompt. Trailing spaces (if any) at the end of the prompt are significant, so be sure to include them. The value is the command string. Be sure to end with the 'return control characters' such as \r\n or \n. If the username or password is part of the command, use the literal string |$username| or |$password| and the telnet plugin will substitute the actual value.
